title: CoverSutra (I Think!) Is Returning
author: John Gruber
excerpt: Long buried, but never forgotten. A lost love from the past is about to rise again. After years of silence, she stirs—ready to rise from the dead, louder than ever!
text: Long buried, but never forgotten. A lost love from the past is about to rise again. In the shadows of the digital graveyard, her heart begins to beat. After years of silence, she stirs—ready to rise from the dead, louder than ever. Don't miss the resurrection. Join the Living App Sign up below to be the first to know when Çåßœ£å returns.
html:
Long buried, but never forgotten.
A lost love from the past is about to rise again.

In the shadows of the digital graveyard, her heart begins to beat. After years of silence, she stirs—ready to rise from the dead, louder
than ever. Don't miss the resurrection.

Join the Living App

Sign up below to be the first to know
when Çåßœ£å returns.
